series.title: Collections of the National Museum of Antiquities at Leiden.

bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., P.J. Sijpesteijn and K.A. Worp, Greek Ostraka. A Catalogue of the Collection of Greek Ostraka in the National Museum of Antiquities at Leiden, with a Chapter on the Greek Ostraka in the Papyrological Institute of the University of Leiden. [Text]; - Plates. (Collections of the National Museum of Antiquities at Leiden. IV.)

C.R. par Robert W. Daniel, Gnomon 56 (1984) pp. 415-419. - Wilfried Van Rengen, ChrEg 57 (1952) No. 114, pp. 363-365. - R. Coles, CR N.S., 31 (1981) pp. 325-326. - B. E. Klakowicz, StPap 20 (1981) pp. 135-138. - G. Wagner, BibO 39 (1982) coll. 569-572.
